titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for US Department of Agriculture, Farm Production and Conservation Business Center, Salaries and Expenses for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for US Department of Agriculture, Farm Production and Conservation Business Center, Salaries and Expenses for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Research, and Biotechnology.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit

bill.summary: This bill limits FY2024 funding for the Farm Production and Conservation Business Center's Salaries and Expenses account.
